Elements.Name: IncludeDir0
Description: Select whether or not to load a set of modified stage files. These files will allow Sonic to handle more consistently during certain missions/bosses in the standard game, and provide a fix for a glitch in Crisis City Act 2.

Elements.Name: IncludeDir1
Description: Select whether Modern Sonic will have the Homing Attack mapped to the Boost button or the Jump button.
Load the modified stage files. This option is recommended for use with the standard game's levels/missions/bosses.
Load no modified stage files. This option is recommended for use with most stage mods.
Map the Homing Attack to the Boost button.
Map the Homing Attack to the Jump button.
